title: Developer platfrorm learning
body: I find that you are charging a fee to use developer platform learning rather hilarious. I have been learning on google for Free, guess I better stick with them. .many of us aren't rolling in green bucks, nor will we possibly be able to repay thousands of dollars in student  loans back. Good luck, I will still utilize Some Resources. I wandered in hoping you were looking for someone like myself with odd characteristics or floaty ideas. But I cant afford you, so I know you could never afford me,
